Record Class Shape

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
fr.uge.backpackhero.model.item.Shape
Record Components:
cells - the list of relative positions that define the shape
public record Shape(List<Position> cells) extends Record
Represents the shape of an item in the backpack. The shape is defined by a list of relative positions that the item occupies. The shape can be rotated to fit different orientations in the backpack.
Author:
Yacine

  • Method Details

    • getAbsolutePositions

      public Set<Position> getAbsolutePositions(Position anchor)
      Returns the absolute positions of the shape based on an anchor position. In other words, it translates the positions of the shape to be relative to the anchor so that we have the actual occupied positions in the backpack for example.
      Parameters:
      anchor - the anchor position to translate the shape's positions
      Returns:
      a set of absolute positions based on the anchor position

    • rotate90

      public Shape rotate90()
      Rotates the shape 90 degrees clockwise.
      Returns:
      a new Shape rotated 90 degrees clockwise

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object).
      Specified by:
